title: [K-12] Emotion-Based Real-Time Learning Effectiveness Monitoring Science Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Real-time learning engagement monitoring system through smartphone-based emotion analysis

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 80% or more of core concepts related to scientific topics (e.g., climate change, microbiology) after completing the 4-week course.
Learners can adjust learning strategies immediately after receiving instructor feedback at identified moments of reduced focus (5+ instances) via real-time facial expression analysis during class.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans based on personalized emotion-engagement reports provided within 24 hours after class.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
